extendedInfo.description: Ordering your favorite Edge to EdgeÂ® pizza just became easier with the new Donatos mobile ordering site for Android!  Founded in 1963, every Donatos famous golden, crispy thin crust pizza is loaded Edge to EdgeÂ® with the finest, freshest toppings.MOBILE ORDERING FEATURES:View our full menu â Order your favorite Signature Pizza, Oven-Baked Sub, Fresh Crisp Salad, or Delicious Sides.Manage your account â Quickly choose your favorite order, view your order history, and update your favorite store right from your phone!Access money-saving Web Specials - Pick a great money-saving offer to round out your meal.Take Donatos with you â Use the store locator to find your closest favorite pizza restaurant while you are traveling. DONATOS.  THE DIFFERENCE IS DELICIOUS.For use at any Donatos location in the United States.

reviews.title: DoNOTos
reviews.comment: App stinks. Use ole rotary phone. Easier than app.
reviews.author: David Bilko

reviews.title: No need for app
reviews.comment: Love the pizza. App just opens a browser. Not a real app. I just use the phone to make sure my order is right
reviews.author: Ronnie Jones

reviews.title: Awful!
reviews.comment: This is the second time I have ordered using this app, come to pick up my order, and my order never went through.  The order is in my order history under my profile but the store has no record of my order being placed.  UNINSTALLING!!!
reviews.author: Caitlin Molnar

reviews.title: Order not right
reviews.comment: Tried out the new app and ordered 2 big dons, one on  wheat, one on white, they got that part right. One on white with hot peppers, one on wheat no hot peppers. Recieved both without hot peppers. Both with extra cheese, didn\'t seem like they had extra cheese. Ordered side salad with no hot peppers, extra ranch, had hot peppers, no extra ranch. Guess I will now uninstall app, seems to not work properly. And no choice on app to add sausage to sandwich either. Uninstall
reviews.author: Timm Reed

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: The app redirects to a site that reports an error when trying to order making both app and site useless.
reviews.author: Dmitri Farafonov

reviews.title: A webpage is NOT an app!
reviews.comment: Really poor attempt by Donatos to peddle a shortcut to a mobile webpage as a native app. There\'s bugs and strange behavior abound in this implementation. I can\'t click on anything, pages are redirecting incorrectly etc. This is not even an app. Things like this should be removed from the Android store.
reviews.author: Greg Heier

reviews.title: This is not an app!
reviews.comment: I mean seriously Donatos, spend the $$ to make a real ordering app and not just an app icon that is a bookmark to your website.
reviews.author: Vince Richter

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: It is just a shortcut to the mobile website which works well, I just don\'t need a icon in my system tray.
reviews.author: Joshua Farmer

reviews.title: Super easy
reviews.comment: Way to go to donatos for making ordering super easy, only complaint...u have to keep going back to make sure your items you don\'t want are not showing as if you did want them so I had to keep going back & removing each one each time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not an App
reviews.comment: This is not an application. All it does is open a browser and take you to Donatos\' web site.
reviews.author: Geoffrey Cook

reviews.title: Agreed - spend the money for a real app!
reviews.comment: I love Donato\'s, but I hate this app! Every time I tried to put in registration info, it would pop up with some HTTP 404 message. I finally gave up, uninstalled, and decided to just call and order like I used to.
reviews.author: Jessica B

reviews.title: Great Pizza
reviews.comment: Easy to order great pizza
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot order
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t submit my order and if I place a time order it doesn\'t keep the time I wanted it for. Not a useful true app. I am a huge fan of Donatos food.
reviews.author: Matt Chapin

reviews.title: Not a real app
reviews.comment: Just a web app in a browser.
reviews.author: Sam Peterson

reviews.title: Really???
reviews.comment: All it is, is a shortcut to the website, its not an \"application.\"
reviews.author: Daniel Raymond

reviews.title: Not an app!
reviews.comment: C\'mon guys get with it!
reviews.author: Chris Whitecotton

reviews.title: This app has a tendency to crash at times on my nexus 7 tablet.
reviews.comment: This has got to be the best and most simplistically made application for ordering pizza cuisine it has to be ridiculous. I love this place and order using this application almost daily. You can even leave your tip online instead of feeling guilt about what to tip. Good job.
reviews.author: cas4ajs

reviews.title: Make an actual app
reviews.comment: Make an actual application for Android instead of a home screen shortcut to your site... I am disappointed...
reviews.author: Ryan Hagood

reviews.title: ROCK HILL
reviews.comment: Can\'t believe they shut down the Rock Hill store. Very disappointed :(
reviews.author: Mike Davis

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This app made me not order pizza from this place tonight. Great food, horrible app.
reviews.author: Robert Chan
